GSD.product_version: versions from v3.19 to before v5.10.159
GSD.description:
mac802154: fix missing INIT_LIST_HEAD in ieee802154_if_add()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.159 by commit 42c319635c0cf7eb36eccac6cda76532f47b61a3, it was introduced in version v3.19 by commit fcf39e6e88e9492f6688ec8ba4e1be622b904232. For more details please see the references link.
